title: Team AVID Looking For Players

embed.description: Team AVID is still in the process of recruiting a full team roster for League of Legends! We are looking for passionate casual League of Legends players who are seeking an established team to play in competitive scenes.

body:
Team AVID is still in the process of recruiting a full team roster for League of Legends! We are looking for passionate casual League of Legends players who are seeking an established team to play in competitive scenes.

We are looking for the following:
1. ADC
2. Analyst
3. Coach

To be apart of Team AVID, applicant must require:

1. **At least _Diamond V_ ranking in SoloQ**
2. An overall posititve team player attitude
3. Able to commit times for scrims or tournaments
4. Located in Sydney

Got what it takes? Send your applications to teamavidgn@gmail.com with the following format:

* Name:
* In-Game Name:
* Age:
* Location:
* OP.GG or Screenshot of your ranking:
* Any previous experience in team environment gaming? (If so, can you briefly describe your experience and why you left):
* Why do you want to join Team AVID?: 
 

Team AVID is looking forward to respond to all applicants and we wish you the best in Summoners' Rift!
